body:
So, has anyone else experienced lag when playing with 40+ players? Its mainly because of 1.7 support and that there are lots of people in one game. I think the best way to fix this is.
(A) remove 1.7 support.
(B) wut happened to DTM02 and DTM03
(C)make pler capacity smaller

Also

i was wondering

why is the map Atlantis even in the rotation! Prismarine blocks are 1.8!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

and who really cares about block hitting anyway. its just a technique for players to get an advantage when their bad anyway.

anything else?

title: Lag- staff plz do something about this
